title: Learning Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Understanding and Applying Early Keratoconus Diagnosis Techniques

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the measurement principles of corneal biomechanical changes and apply dynamic deformation image analysis methods.
Learners can replicate the diagnostic process for early keratoconus using machine learning-based ensemble models through simulation tools.
Learners can comparatively evaluate the performance differences between existing clinical diagnostic indicators and new machine learning models.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
